author: Romy Gill
method: Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl, except the oil and salad. Make small patties with the mixture using your hands. Add the rapeseed oil to a non-stick pan. Shallow fry the patties for 2-3 minutes on each side. You may have to cook them in batches. Remove the patties from the pan and transfer them to a plate lined with kitchen paper to drain any excess oil. Serve with salad.
ingredients: 340g/12oz tinned white crabmeat (about 2 tins),  1 tsp red Kashmiri chilli powder,  2 tsp garam masala ,  1 tsp grated garlic ,  1 tsp grated fresh root ginger,  1 red onion, chopped ,  4 tsp chopped fresh coriander ,  50g/1Â¾oz grated beetroot,  4 tsp plain flour,  4 tsp desiccated coconut,  4 tsp white poppy seeds,  salt, to taste,  4 tsp rapeseed oil,  salad, to serve
